CustomField.description: Field "Price Contract Code" that has been set up on each "Purchasing Contract" in EAM. The Value is unique per Subcontractor (e.g. MSN-HAKL/21 for Hydrotech) and is used to identify the contract where specific rate cards/schedules have been set up that define the agreed price for specific services (such as e.g. Planned Meter Replacements).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field "Price Contract Code" on each "Purchasing Contract" in EAM. The Value is unique per Subcontractor (e.g. MSN-HAKL/21 for Hydrotech).
CustomField.label: Price Contract Code
